segmentosSRT.text: The team wins 3-0 in his opening game.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: The second game in Armenia was tied 0-0.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: The final game of the championship tied 1-1 against Medellín in the first round
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: and in the second round they lost against Quindío 0-2.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03

segmentosSRT.text: Four minutes left for Nacional to be the champion.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_03
